#### About me
  
* Shiyu is a first-year MS student at Cornell University Department of Animal Science. 
* Shiyu is currently working on the extraction of microalgal protein  as animal feed / human food. 
* She loves animals in general and loves going into the nature in search of animals, but she doesn't own any pet herself.
